00017 namespace stxxl
00018 {
00019 
00020         class RWLock
00021         {
00022                 pthread_rwlock_t rwlock;
00023               public:
00024 
00025                   RWLock ()
00026                 {
00027                         stxxl_nassert (pthread_rwlock_init (&rwlock, NULL));
00028                 };
00029                  ~RWLock ()
00030                 {
00031                         stxxl_nassert (pthread_rwlock_destroy (&rwlock));
00032                 };
00033                 void rdlock ()
00034                 {
00035                         stxxl_nassert (pthread_rwlock_rdlock (&rwlock));
00036                 };
00037                 void wrlock ()
00038                 {
00039                         stxxl_nassert (pthread_rwlock_rdlock (&wrlock));
00040                 };
00041                 void unlock ()
00042                 {
00043                         stxxl_nassert (pthread_rwlock_unlock (&mutex));
00044                 };
00045         };
00046 
00047 }

00049 #endif
